n=int(input())
for i in range(n):
    s=""
    for j in range(n):
        if (i+j)%2==0:s+="W"
        else:s+="B"
    print(s)

n = int(input())
a = 'WB' * (n // 2)
b = 'BW' * (n // 2)
if n & 1:
    a += 'W'
    b += 'B'
for i in range(n):
    print(a if i & 1 else b)

import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline

n = int(input())
s = ['WB' * (n // 2) + 'W' * (n % 2), 'BW' * (n // 2) + 'B' * (n % 2)]
for i in range(n):
    print(s[i % 2])

n = int(input())
mass = ['W', 'B']
s = ''
for i in range(n + 2):
    s += mass[i % 2]
for i in range(n):
    print(s[i % 2:n + i % 2])
